items.q: The summer in New England has been very rainy. ____________________ (Same / Likewise), the West Coast has been getting record levels of rainfall.
____________________ (Although / Unlike) we would like a new community center, there is not enough money in the budget now to build one.
The cost of food has been rising dramatically in recent months. ____________________ (Similarly / Compared to), we are now paying substantially more for a gallon of gas.
____________________ (Compared to / Even though) ten years ago, the summers are now much hotter here.
We've decided to move into a new apartment this September. ____________________ (In addition / Even though), we're going to buy a new car.

Choose the best answer. a. Global warming is causing increased rainfall, it is causing droughts in some areas. b. Global warming is causing increased rainfall. On the other hand, it is causing droughts in some areas.
Choose the best answer. a. The major cities around the world, such as Mumbai, are becoming very sophisticated. b. The Major Cities around the world, such as mumbai, are becoming very sophisticated.

Choose the best answer. a. Diseases that are transferred from animals to humans are increasing. However, no one understands why. b. Diseases that are transferred from animals to humans are increase, no one understands why.

Choose the best answer. a. Most people think that politicians has personal interests in the causes they supports. b. Most people think that politicians have personal interests in the causes they support.

Choose the best answer. a. The number of elephants in Uganda is decreasing. In contrast, the elephant population in Kenya is increasing. b. The number of elephants in Uganda is decreasing, the elephant population in Kenya are increasing.
likewise a. also b. but c. however

customs a. shirts b. traditions c. food
soley a. hardly b. secondly c. only
hemisphere a. in math class b. in music class c. in geography class
to take root a. to refuse to grow b. to begin to grow c. to grow slowly
concept a. idea b. music c. language
